attributes.action: Award to each member of the Special Air Service Regiment involved in the Battle of Mirbat 1972, a Military Medal and to Sgt Labalaba a posthumous VC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 19th July 1972 a 9 man team from the 22 Special Air service Regt led by Major Mike Kealy DSO fought off an attack by some 250 Adoo rebels at the Port of Mirbat in the Dhofar province of Southern Oman.
Each man that day performed above and  beyond anything expected of a British soldier, even those of the SAS.
For full details see: www.britains-smallwars.com

I would ask that suitable recognition be given to those not already recognised in the form of the Military Medal and a posthumous VC be given to Sgt Labalaba for the extraordinary role he played during this fierce fighting

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the MOD.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
